data.title: Bill Blackwood - Actor Home - Bill Blackwood - Actor
data.meta_description: Bill Blackwood Actor in Film, Television and on the Stage.  Also a Voiceover artist with a fabulous voice!
data.text:
"Bill is a non egotistical, considerate, able, disabled creative presence who is excited by every contribution he makes to a project - be it as a supporting artist in a prime time drama to a lead in short film or indeed a presenter in a documentary....I have to admit that the middle aged, northern, disabled guy has put more effort in to where he is now and deserves to be acknowledged as breaking through so many barriers"

Jules Hussey, Producer

"In his performance he âmade the air move"

Jordan Hogg, Director

"Bill approached the job with great professionalism, and our team found him an absolute pleasure to deal with, especially in the way he accommodated all the changes to the schedule due to COVID. Bill was a wholly committed member of the team, and his truly memorable performance as Tony Tanner was praised by audiences and commissioners alike."

Sarah Brown, Creative Director of Drama, STV Studios

"Thanks Bill! You were a dream to work with" Philip Barantini, Director
